title: Shipmonk for the win!
reviews: Had a good overall experience working with Shipmonk. Dashboard was easy to use and seemed simple.

title: We transferred to ShipMonk from UPS eFulfillment
reviews: We transferred to ShipMonk eFullfillment from UPS eFulfillment. We were concerned that our online store shipments would be interrupted during the conversion. They were not. We integrated our WooCommerce store to ShipMonk with the help of their support and integration teams. Their support was personal, fast, and effective. The whole transition was handled with the involvement of several people at ShipMonk, including the initial salesperson, and the experience was just excellent.

title: Great account Manager!!
reviews:
With everything going on in the world with Covid 19, shipping can be a challenge.
Our account manager with Shipmonk, Michelle McCall has been very proactive when trying to resolve issues with our shipping problems.
She goes the extra step to find a solution and if she does not know, she will reach out to others to find the answer.
She has only had our account for a few months, but I feel secure and confident we have someone to go to when needed.
Thank you Michelle.
Lissa
Halo Beauty

title: Immoral and unethical... STAY AWAY!!
reviews:
This company is terrible. I was a client with Shipmonk for 2 years and here are just a FEW of the mishaps I had to deal with.

1. Support tickets go answered for days, weeks, MONTHS then mysteriously get marked as Resolved. I have to open another ticket to get my issue addressed, most of the time it’s multiple tickets because they never answer them.

2. Special Projects go ignored. I submitted a request to label, repack and ship to Amazon FBA. It went untouched for 2 MONTHS. When I asked about the status they ignored me and marked it as Resolved.

3. I requested a wholesale order be palletized and shipped. Their website clearly states wholesale orders will be ready to ship within 2 DAYS. It went untouched for 10 DAYS until I followed up with them. Their LTL freight quotes were ridiculous. $492 for 3 pallets to travel 60 miles. I used my own freight forwarder and only paid $350. Do not use their freight forwarder, use your own. Then they charged me $192 to palletize 3 pallets of product! My second wholesale order they charged me $385 to palletize 6 pallets! (Most 3PLs charge $10/pallet.)

4. I created 4 wholesale orders and provided them prepaid UPS labels. They disregarded my instructions and billed me for shipping! I asked to be reimbursed because I provided them with PREPAID LABELS but they flat out said NO. I filed a dispute with my credit card company to get my money back. For unknown reasons my bank sided with Shipmonk and reimbursed them the funds. Then Shipmonk RE-BILLED ME for the exact same amount! Now they have DOUBLE the money they were never supposed to bill me for in the first place. I asked for a refund of the second charges but they refused. I even showed them the letter from my bank saying they sided with Shipmonk but they claimed they never received the reimbursed funds.

They also charged me $13.50 per carton to slap a label on it and put it out for UPS to pick up. (Most 3PLs charge $5 a carton.)

5. Three times they asked what I would like done with customer returns that were returned to their warehouse. I said ship them back to me but I never received any product.

6. They do not provide photos of customer returns so you cannot verify the customer actually returned the correct product. All you get is an email notification and you are at liberty to refund the customer. They could have returned a counterfeit item or a pile of rocks but you would never know.

7. Don't bother submitting a ticket when a customer package gets lost in transit. They do not respond. You can't even file the claim yourself with the shipper because Shipmonk has all of the shipping information and they will not give it to you.

8. They "lost" 20 cartons of my product and refused to reimburse me for the product cost or the supposed storage fees I was paying on it.

9. Closing my account was a headache and the process took over 5 weeks. TWICE they said they would credit my account if I signed their Closing Agreement which had a very detailed non-disparagement clause, meaning I could not say or post anything negative about them. Obviously they were aware I was upset with their services and were trying to shut me up. Sounds like a bribe! I flat out said NO I am not signing this. I thought my account was closed and then I got hit with their $250 monthly minimum fee on my account! AGAIN they said they would credit me the $250 if I sign their non-disparagement agreement. I said NO again and threatened to hire an attorney and pursue legal action if they didn't close my account immediately. That seemed to do the trick and I am finally done with these clowns.

Working with Shipmonk has been the worst decision I ever made for my business. They will fight you tooth and nail for every single red cent they can get out of you. They NEVER take responsibility for mistakes, it’s always YOUR FAULT. If you are doing wholesale orders, LTL shipping or Amazon FBA then this place is a nightmare to deal with. I do not recommend Shipmonk to anybody who is serious about their e-commerce business or their sanity.

title: I wish I joined SOONER!
reviews: The people at Shipmonk did a great job of working with me through the move from my previous 3PL. The service has been great and I suggest anyone on the fence about moving to Shipmonk should pull the trigger. I wish I did it sooner.

title: I do not recommend.
reviews: I sorted through many 3PL companies before signing with Shipmonk. I was extremely excited to begin and streamline my business after talking to the sales agents and researching. I was immediately disappointed. I have now been with them for approximately 6 months and it has been nothing but headache after headache while pouring more money into shipping and website development to accommodate things. I will give credit to their support team for always trying to sort through issues and correct them. Though i have gone though periods where it has been weeks before getting a response. I have not tried other companies yet but if I could I would turn back time and gone another way. I do not recommend them.

title: Top quality
reviews: Fantastic company for fulfilment, from start to finish they have been a pleasure to work with. Orders go out on time, would highly recommend.

title: Awesome, understanding and helpful people!
reviews:
I joined ShopMonk after a terrible experience with Amazon and they have been exceptionally helpful and understanding.

I am still in a very difficult situation but the Support Team has been amazing with a focus on the future rather than on the short term difficulties.

They have gained my trust and respect through their actions and I look forward to a bright future with them!

title: THESE THIEVES DON'T EVEN DESERVE 1 STAR
reviews: THIS COMPANY IS A BUNCH OF CROOKS OMG WHERE DO I EVEN BEGIN? THANK YOU FOR NEARLY PUTTING MY BUSINESS OUT OF BUSINESS. LOSING INVENTORY, LETTING INVENTORY SIT FOR AGES, OVERCHARGING, DODGY PRICING THAT THEY CHANGE ALL OF THE TIME WHERE EVEN WHEN INVENTORY WOULD GO DOWN MY PRICE WOULD GO UP CUZ "IT HAD TO BE MOVED" UMMM NOT MY PROBLEM. DO NOT EVEN WASTE YOUR TIME! GO TO JMF IF YOU ARE IN SOUTH FLORIDA.

title: They are the worst
reviews: They are the worst. I can't think of a thing they did right. It was a full time job managing them. They lost product, mishipped product, and were never able to sort out all the issues before we left. They overcharged us $20/day for a pallet when we had a signed contract for $20/month per pallet. I think that's called stealing? If you want to go out of business use SHIPMONK. They do that for free.

title: Dear ALL please do not use this Company…
reviews:
Dear ALL please do not use this Company service, it's absolutely terrible service I have ever received.
They LOST my inventory, refund me only 40% of the COST, only 40%!!!
Charging me minimum monthly fee randomly since I have applied for account closing!!
Terrible service, no one could help me or bring some answers.
I do have all the proof and evedience.

title: DO NOT USE SHIPMONK - RUN AWAY NOW
reviews:
if you are looking for a new 3PL, let me just start by saying.... DO NOT USE SHIPMONK. There are so many better options out there and the biggest regret ever is that I used ShipMonk for the past 18 months.

This is my break up letter with ShipMonk and I couldn't be more excited to leave them.

Not only is the customer service TERRIBLE, but so was my fulfillment experience. They offer a nice online system to check on orders, but lets talk about the important stuff.

SHIPPING PRICES: One of the main reasons you use a good 3PL is to have the ability to take advantage of their cheaper / negotiated rates. Not the case here... rather than get cheaper rates, they are charging you more for every single carrier. I was getting cheaper rates using ShipStation back when I shipped myself. They are charging you as much as possible to just provide more profits for them, truly not caring for these small businesses they are providing services for.

2 DAY SHIPPING? RUN AS FAR AS YOU CAN FROM SHIPMONK!!!! In todays world, expedited shipping is becoming the new standard, and if you are looking to offer that to your -customers, MOVE ON TO THE NEXT COMPANY FAST. ShipMonk's 2-Day shipping cost was so incredibly high.. there were MANY cases where I would pay for their "custom label fee" which is $5, provide my own label via ShipStation, and it would STILL be cheaper than the cost they were giving me. How does that even happen? They offer 'DHL EXPEDITED MAX (2-3 BUSINESS DAY) and I did a report on all shipments that used this service and almost NONE made it there within 5 business days, causing me to refund SO many customers that paid extra for expedited shipping. I prefer USPS priority as I think the prices are fair, but they don't offer this for the 48 domestic states, only for Hawaii and Alaska which is the biggest joke EVER.

LOST SHIPMENTS: This past year I've lost over 100 shipments with DHL and other random carriers they brought on and they didn't care about replacing these orders or reimbursing those costs.

INVENTORY: I have hundreds of products so this was difficult, but I caught many mistakes on our weights and dimensions of products that were WAY WAY WAY OFF, which means you get charged more for shipping when you shouldn't be. You literally have to baby sit and monitor there every move to make sure things are done correctly, but no small business has the time for this.

STORAGE COSTS: There storage costs are pretty standard.. but want to know the worst part? They won't tell you what they are charging for each specific product. I wanted a way to see which product was being charged what, especially after selling through 90% of the inventory where maybe the product was in a bigger bin previously, and now I know it should have been moved to something smaller. I asked if I could get a report of all my storage costs, but they were unable to do so. Just said 'we don't offer that'. How are you generating these costs if you can't tell me what the cost is for each product?

PICK FEES: Pick fees are MUCH higher than the competition. You will find cheaper with any other 3pl, trust me.

When it came to closing my account, I was prepared to file a lawsuit it got so bad and I honestly wish I did. To 'close out my account and move my inventory' it took a whopping 35 days. You read that right.. 35 DAYS! That's 35 days of not being able to take sales. Thankfully - I had our best sellers already on Amazon so I could manually fulfil orders, but this is just a joke. Not only did it take this long to get my inventory picked up, they messed up NUMEROUS cartons mislabeling the contents and didn't label my pallets correctly.

I ended up leaving them to go with Shopify Fulfillment Network, but if you don't qualify for them, I highly recommend ShipBob. I received quotes from over 5 3PL's and if I wasn't going with Shopify, ShipBob was my next choice.

Now that you've read this long review, stop any communication with them as soon as you can! :)

Sincerely your customer you never cared about anyways,

Mike

title: Positive experience
reviews:
Positive experience

When looking for a 3PL, I evaluated probably close to 10 options. Shipmonk seemed like the best one and after working with them for close to a year, I'm confident that I've made the right decision.

Great rates, fast shipping, helpful staff!

title: Overall a good company
reviews:
Overall a good company. I've used other 3PL solutions in the past, and so far, ShiMonk has been the best. They are not perfect in my opinion, they have strengths and weaknesses. To me, their strengths are in the efficiency/speed to ship the orders, in the Customer service and software side of things. You always receive a reply from a happiness engineer really fast, and they are very polite and kind people, which makes the experience great. I also had to talk with my account manager to negotiate some prices, and he was super kind and open to discuss the prices, to keep us as a customer. The software/dashboard is good, with a lot of insights, nice UX, and it's easy to use and understand what's happening, even if you have lots of orders and SKUs.
Now, to the weak points. Fulfillment errors are not so uncommon as you'd like, at least in my experience. I thought they were happening because it was Q4, near the Holidays, but they kept happening when entering January and also February. The good part is that they refund you for those mistakes after you fill a claim, but this could happen much less in my opinion, because it definitely hurts your brand image if it happens too much (nobody likes receiving wrong orders). Another thing I don't like is the way they charge you for some things like Storage. It's confusing, and not transparent in my opinion. For example, my product is small, and is stocked in few units (most of the times less than 1000 units). It could theoretically fit their smallest bin for each SKU, however, I also pay for storage space for other bigger storage places. I remember asking about this some time ago, but I did not get a satisfactory explanation and I still don't understand why I have to pay for the bigger storage spaces if my product could easily fit in their smaller/cheapest storage unit. Other than that, everything is good. I would love it if they could solve those points, would easily earn a 5 star instead of 4. If you are on the fence, I think you should at least give them a try, overall it has been a good service to us.

title: Look elsewhere for a 3PL
reviews: We chose Shipmonk and have had many failed promises. Countless picking mistakes, numerous additional fees. Delays for special projects, miscounts and more. They promised seamless International EEI docs but have never delivered.

title: Great service
reviews: Thank you for the great service.

title: What a fantastic company
reviews: What a fantastic company. Not only are they effective and efficient, but their customer service is superb. Really helped us out on a personal level with our business on top of doing an excellent job at fulfillment.

title: I'm not sure why there are so many bad…
reviews:
I'm not sure why there are so many bad reviews for this company, but my experience has been great so far.

The system / technology work well, they automatically fulfill the orders, and the people are friendly and helpful.

title: I was forced and blackmailed to delete…
reviews:
I was forced and blackmailed to delete my first review by their so called “Vice President of happiness” Adam McCow because the company wouldn’t release our products and closeout our account until I removed the Google and TrustPilot review. Their closing agreement that they force customers to sign goes against the constitution and against the 1st amendment right. The closing agreement is a modification of the original service agreement. They know that nobody would sign when acquiring customers so they do a sneaky thing and force you to sign it at the very end when they hold your products a hostage. This is fully illegal and don’t let them get away with this. If you are a company that has experienced the same mistreatment by ShipMonk, make sure to reach out to an attorney regard this and make sure to sue ShipMonk. We canceled our account almost 6 months ago and we signed our “closing agreement” back in November. We missed two of our largest sales (Black Friday and Christmas sale) due to their refusal to closeout out account. We still haven’t received our products and we will most likely have to write them off as stolen. They also still charge us for storage. Whatever you do, make sure to avoid this company, do not remove your reviews and make sure to hire legal help. As an entrepreneur of 15 years I have never worked with such an immoral company.

Earlier posted review:
This company almost ruined our ecommerce business. We are still trying to get our products from their warehouse and they are not releasing them. I'll be writing a more lengthy review soon but I just wanted to warn consumers to beware and to stay away from this business. They are not what they say that they are. They will without any regard ruin everything you have built and they will always have an excuse and blame you or other circumstances.

title: Hidden Fees & a terrible experience
reviews:
Hidden Fees & a terrible experience.
The customer service was woeful when dealing with Ship Monk and they charged me thousands throughout 2020 when I only had 49 units of stock. So you have an understanding, the stock could have fit in 8 shoe boxes and when i asked their team for a stock count they just didn't get back to me.

Seems pretty unreasonable to charge someone $2,000 + storage fees in a few short months to have a few units in their warehouse when they didn't give me a stock count.

I would not use Ship Monk if i were you, look into their hidden fees and if they say they don't have any hidden fees they are not telling the truth.

They love to take advantage of small business during a pandemic! Disgusting.

title: Refuses to take responsibility for lost inventory
reviews: Horrible company. They refuse to take responsibility for lost inventory. My carton was lost 3 months ago and they've been looking for it for over a month. They keep claiming that it was found and then shipped out again. Where?! With a reused shipping label?? You already shipped out someone else's carton and now you're trying to tell me you reused the shipping label and sent it again? The box is lost. Take responsibility and pay for it.

title: Absolutely the worst!
reviews:
Absolutely the worst!

The experience with Shipmonk has been a nightmare to say the least and has cost my business thousands of dollars. The bottom line is they refuse to issue a refund when they make a mistake. When you file a claim, there is no claim# or confirmation they rcvd your claim. It just goes into a mysterious black hole and you never hear about the issue again. It's very clear after talking to their management that they have a strict policy of not refunding customers when they make a mistake. Here are just a few examples of problems that we've had where they refuse to take responsibility

1) shipping product that isn't our. we had customers complaining they rcvd random products that were not even our companies. Shipmonk has refused to take responsibility even though we submitted claims showing the photos of the incorrect product.
2) shipping in the wrong packaging: We set-up customer packaging so some of our products would ship in poly-mailers. They told us this was set up and for a while it was working. For for the past month, instead of shipping in the correct package, they decided to ship in massive 20X20X12 boxes which increased our cost by 7 times! Now every package they ship costs $49 instead of $7.00. We even worked with one of their VP's to set up the custom packaging and had their assurances all was ok.
3)taking months to fulfill wholesale orders. If you need to send items to Amazon in a timely matter, you can forget about it. It takes their wholesale team literally months to send out a case to amazon or other wholesale account
4) Not able to fulfill Amazon FBM. They repeatedly missed the deadline causing our Amazon account to go into "high-risk" and nearly being shut down.
5) Took 2 months to fulfill e-commerce orders. We all knew there would be delays during the holiday, but as of January 10, we still have orders from Black Friday that have not been fulfilled. To make matters worse we have to offer refunds for products that were ordered on Thanksgiving that just arrived this week and Shipmonk is refusing to pay because they say they fulfilled the order.

I highly recommend using any other 3PL. While it's true that all 3PL's will make many mistakes, most 3PL's will do the right thing. Shipmonk clearly has created a business culture where they will do anything to try and avoid taking responsibility for mistakes they made. It's a very shady way of doing business and I don't expect they will be around for long unless they drastically change how they handle claims and customer complaints.

title: where do I start
reviews:
where do I start, They don't take responsibility for anything! extremely long fulfillment times( over 30 days!!), lost packages, lost receiving and missing inventory(even when someone signed for them), and worse of all they take no resonsibility. There is always an excuse for everything and no compensation for the losses.
Avoid if you can! save your self some money and aggravation and lost clients.

title: A top-notch partner
reviews: We were in a difficult situation with an already-shipped from abroad into the US, multi-pallet shipment and were researching a multitude of warehouse fulfillment choices in the US. We found the folks at ShipMonk to be so honest, straightforward and willing to assist on a personal level that it was so easy for us to make the decision in choosing them. Thank you, ShipMonk, you are really a top-notch partner!

title: Stay away, i'm warning you.
reviews:
We've only had issues after signing up with Shipmonk. You sign up with a 3PL to have peace of mind but Ship Monk is far from it. There are new problems every day.

Their employees are mispacking orders and can't follow instructions.

If issues arise it takes over a week to be dealt with and if there is an issue their favorite line to use is "We can do a special project for you for $45/hr" and they don't take responsibility for anything.

If you're a smaller business they don't care about you.

I'm warning you. Shipmonk looks like sunshine and rainbows on the outside but once you signup it's the complete opposite. Stay away.

title: Unlimited problems, unlimited excuses
reviews:
UPDATE: Their happiness engineers are doing their best. Thank goodness! I respectfully wanted to commend Scotty for being very patient in helping us resolve the mispicks and fulfillment errors.

- - -
I almost thought our issues were resolved last week but hello to more problems this week! Our email is almost on fire due to unhappy customers and the problems with Shipmonk never ends! Delayed receiving, wrong items shipped, misplaced inventory, unlimited excuses. And the blame is always on the courier or something else.

title: What a scam
reviews: What a scam. Stay the heck away. They charge you whatever they want by holding your inventory hostage! This should be illegal. The worst company I have ever come across! They won't even call you back. Do yourself a favor and work with a company that cares for you and your customers.

title: This company is the absolute worst
reviews: This company is the absolute worst. Stay away. They screw up shipments constantly, hugely delay shipments for a subscription business, charge insane fees, never respond to emails or issues in a timely way. They talk a big game but don't back it up all. If you are an entrepreneur running a small business - I highly suggest you stay away from these guys.

title: I would NEVER recommend Shipmonk
reviews: I would NEVER recommend this fulfillment company to anyone... especially a startup that is trying to build their reputation. Shipmonk has been the biggest headache for me. I am the founder of my company and have direct interaction with the Shipmonk team and software on a daily basis. They have lost my product (numerous times) and blame me for it every time. Never apologizing even once it is found. They literally LOSE my product. They charge extreme amounts for a service that is hardly fulfilled. "Over promise, Under deliver" is how I would rate Shipmonk. They do a great job at selling you on their services and once you move all your inventory and really invest in them, they start treating you like you're worth nothing to them. I currently have orders backed up for 7 days when their expected shipping timeframe is 3 days or less. No apologies just excuses. "It's a busy time of year." they say. I never take the time to write reviews but I felt this was absolutely necessary. I hope you consider ALL OTHER options before partnering with Shipmonk. Please feel free to call me directly if you'd like a more personal review of this company. 954-707-0665

title: Thoroughly professional service
reviews: Everyone I've interacted with at ShipMonk has been very professional, polite and helpful. The staff are clearly busy but take the time to answer your query and help you out. Their technology is also really slick and, so far, has worked flawlessly with my Shopify store. They're not the cheapest but based on my research are probably the best value.

title: Great logistics company for ecommerce
reviews: We are having a great experience with ShipMonk since we transitioned to them from our previous 3PL. Dramatic improvement in helping us scale and being on time for customer orders. Highly recommended.

title: Best experience
reviews: We are very happy with our new 3PL. Works like Swiss clock. All deliveries are done promptly and packages are delivered in the greatest condition!

title: It was a nightmare
reviews: It was a nightmare. They broke hundreds of my glass bottle inventory and was not willing to compensate. Customer service is basically talking to robots and your issues will never get resolved. It's just so bad.

title: You focus on sales = Shipmonk takes care of fulfillment!
reviews: Shipmonk is a true fulfillment partner. We have the assurance that the most important part of our business (deliveries) is going smoothly. It's plug and play once you're in their system! We focus on sales, and our partner Shipmonk takes care of the rest!

title: Very unreliable
reviews: Very unreliable. When you fulfill an order it takes how many days before a tracking number becomes available. Sometimes they will post a tracking number but with no result.

title: One of the most deceitful businesses ever DO NOT USE
reviews:
One of the most deceitful businesses I have ever dealt with.

They increased our storage fees from $500 to $2000+ per month without even notifying us. Can not get a refund.

DO NOT EVER consider using Shipmonk.

title: Very professional team
reviews: Very professional team, software integration with amazon works like a breeze.

title: They've been so helpful in helping our…
reviews: They've been so helpful in helping our business grow to the level that it has. There would've been no way for us to scale as quickly without them. They have really amazing customer service and are always a call away to help us with any issues. Highly recommend them!

title: The interface is quite easy to use…
reviews: The interface is quite easy to use along with the graphics. Also, everything is so well organized. I also like how the inventory section can organize the number of products from least to most which have been helpful for my work.

title: Mario is our rockstar!
reviews: Mario is the man! Thanks for all your help, Mario. You always stay on top of our requests.

title: 5 Stars for Shipmonk
reviews:
5 Stars for Shipmonk!

Shipmonk's interface is very easy to navigate which makes things 100x easier. I definitely would recommend to those who are on the fence.

title: have been with Shipmonk two years and…
reviews: have been with Shipmonk two years and they are great!

title: By far the worse company ever!
reviews:
By far the worse company ever!! Please do not do business with them unless you like losing money. They will never take responsibility, overcharge you and shift blame every chance they get. I've lost major account/sales cause I've done business based on their empty promises.

Update-
Just so you know how shady this company is they reported me to trust pilot as a fake review to try and get my review removed. I provided all the doc to trust pilot and they reinstated my review. They went thru the trouble of trying to get my review removed instead of actually solving the issues. I bet their score would be a lot lower if they weren't actively trying to hide bad reviews.

title: ShipMonk works well
reviews:
I have always found the 'Happiness Engineers' (this is so not British but I love it!!) to be really helpful and they have always resolved any issues I have had.

ShipMonk have really helped us store and ship our products out around the U.S.

title: Couldn’t be happier!
reviews: I have been working with Shipmonk for a few years and have received the BEST service I could possibly expect. Their team is attentive to detail, responsive and reliable. I have worked directly with Cheryl Haynes and Adam Mackow and they provide the true support and happiness they promise.

title: Great Service
reviews: Shipmonk has been a fantastic fulfillment service to us. Their customer service is very hands on and will answer any questions you have within the day. They do their best to take care of you. My experience with their new San Bernardino warehouse has been great and efficient. As for data tracking, they will link straight into your online shop which makes it easy to keep up with your shipments. Highly recommended

title: We used Shipmonk for order fulfillment
reviews:
We used their platform for fulfilling our books. It worked well. Seamless integration. You don't have to worry if there is a technical issue. We were assigned a relationship manager. They'll make sure your queries are sorted, issues are resolved. No need for continuous follow-ups.

Products are shipped on time, tracking information passed on instantly.

Pricing seems normal. It's in line with industry standards.

I recommend Shipmonk if you are looking to automate your order fulfillment. You don't have to worry about logistics.

title: It's been a pleasure for us to work…
reviews: It's been a pleasure for us to work with Shipmonk, for a long period of time with much success. There is no doubt that our business growth was possible thanks to Shipmonk's ability to scale while our business and marking scale with accuracy and control all over, and less handling with the logistics as Shipmonk does great work

title: 2 Years in and Still Going Strong!
reviews: I started with ShipMonk two years ago and still going strong. They’ve been a great shipping partner during our growth.

title: Good people
reviews:
Good people; i like them.

Start up fees are high; but after that; its great flow

title: Great Experience with Shipmonk
reviews: I have been very impressed overall with Shipmonk. Like any company, reality happens, especially with all that is going on right now. However, they have been honest and transparent and have worked very well and hard through all of the economic challenges. Thanks Shipmonk!

title: Pricing and customer service and…
reviews:
Pricing and customer service and top-notch! If you're in the drop shipping or commodity shipping business, you'll be hard-pressed to find a better partner with as advanced of a tech-stack.

Only downside is that there is no direct access to the actual location where your goods are stored so you will be speaking with a very friendly and responsive intermediary, which is not ideal. The operation is very cookie-cutter which greatly helps with efficiency but not great if you have special requests.

Despite the above, still, HIGHLY recommend!

title: It works, but not perfect
reviews:
+User-friendly interface
+Reasonable shipping prices with many options
+Ability to do an extra custom project if necessary
+Reliable performance

- lack of reporting tools
- bit pricy
-- when you ship 10 boxes and only 1 arrives, they will confirm with a signature that 10 boxes were delivered. You will never be able to dispute the delivery with the carrier

title: Satisfied with Services
reviews:
We find Shipmonk great, it is easy to navigate through + adjust items. Happiness Engineers are very helpful and attend to us as needed, no request to them has gone unnoticed + respond same day if not sooner with an email/phone call.

I've only come across 1 glitch two already and that's for splitting back-orders which is now resolved- at the time the system wasn't allowing me to split orders but was resolved same day. Other than that we are satisfied with the services provided.


Kindly,
Brenda

title: I dont expect them to keep this review…
reviews:
I dont expect them to keep this review up but if I can save 1 business it's worth it.

You remember the fairly young cyclist mr.portal that recently died at the age of 40? More on him in a second

The only good things about this business is their flashy website.

Read the contract! After their employees are done stealing your items, overcharging storage.shipping Bill's 2x what they should be you will want/need to leave. At which point they will charge you $2 or $3 for every product left in inventory (that they didn't steal yet) that you want to pick.

20,000 products? Pay $34,000 to pick up (20,000- 3,000 stolen x $2)

You think thats bad?

How much does it cost you to re-acquire customers after they mess up the shipping?

How much is your time worth on the phone dealing with "happiness engineers" with no authority to do/fix anything.

Do whatever you can to find a better fulfilment provider,there are tons out there. Or pick this place and end up like the former pro cyclist that died of a heart attack at 40(rip).

title: Great customer service
reviews: Shipmonk's customer service is superb. They are very responsive and will do well to accommodate even special requests. I believe this is their strength. When you deal with people who can be trusted and relied on, you know you're in good hands. Apart from that, their platform is easy-to-use and intuitive. I highly recommend this company.

title: Great having ShipMonk in my corner
reviews:
ShipMonk has been super responsive from day one. They took the time to understand my business and needs from a fulfillment standpoint, and have consistently delivered on their promises up to this point.

Their interface is clean and easy to use as well. Reliable fulfillment companies are not easy to find. I highly recommend checking out ShipMonk if you're looking for one for your business.

title: Heed these warnings...
reviews:
... if you like to stay in business.

We have been using Shipmonk for over 2 years. Their customer service is ok and so is their application but they will kill your startup with their ridiculous minimums and storage fees. To make it worse they you cannot trust what shipping they quote you, they will come back and charge 2 to 3X the original price quoted on the order. The latest example being charging $55 when the quote was $26. If I re-do the same order I am still shown $26. Its essentially fraud.

Also their minimum fees is a ridiculous concept. This is what I got from their support "when storage exceeds $250.00 your minimum increases to the storage cost". They already charge a premium on storage and they you end up paying 2X that because invariably your storage fees will cross usd 250 (unless you are shipping really small items with limited number of SKUs) and then that would become your new minimum, essentially doubling your storage fees. While they claim this crucial clause was always there on their website (we don't remember reading it) their sales agent never bothered to mention it during the initial meeting we had and it is not in our contract.

Also it is nearly impossible to know what you are paying for when it comes to storage "their system" essentially decides and there is very little visibility as to why you are paying of X number of pallets or Y number of bins. Also you would be paying for a whole pallet (X2 because of the minimums) even if you have 1 unit left on it and to make it worse you don't know so you can't do anything about it.

It is very hard to change a warehouse once you are stuck with one so do your research before you make the mistake we did.

Find someone else unless you love throwing away money. Companies like Shipmonk should go out of business so companies that do care about their customers can do well.

Echo in the line from a review below because we had to deal with the exact issue, thousands of dollars worth of lost inventory after they signed for it:
"Some examples: They lose inventory upon receiving, because they don't check what they sign for when product is delivered to them vs. what they actually receive and enter into the system. So when shipments show as delivered but the inventory is missing from the warehouse, their excuse is that they receive too many shipments to possibly try to check what was actually received. They have literally, on multiple occasions, lost thousands of dollars of inventory, and even when escalated to the CEO, refuse to accept ownership of this or do anything about it. And because they signed the delivery slip, you can no longer claim for a lost package from the shipper."

One more thing.. do not trust the review posted on capterra .com. Capterra is a paid service and they will only post reviews they like, this review never showed up there even though it was posted there over 3 months ago, didn't even get an acknowledgement.

title: Worst company in the history of…
reviews: Worst company in the history of fulfillment companies. Their customer service is so poor. They have overcharged me for shipping and have failed to credit me. Their management team is non existent. Do yourself a favor and find a better fulfillment partner.

title: Shipmonk was a great resource for us…
reviews: Shipmonk was a great resource for us when we first started doing ecomm but didn't have the ability to fulfill ourselves. They were always responsive and had affordable shipping rates, just make sure you have enough volume to meet the minimum as it can get pricy. Overall we had a great experience and would use again, and does Amazon really need any more money?

title: At the critical time of year (Black…
reviews:
At the critical time of year (Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Christmas), they will only focus on their biggest customers and they will leave you high and dry.

We have hundreds of out of stock orders. The new inventory was delivered on Wednesday at lunchtime. It's now 9.30pm on Friday and not only have they not dispatched the orders, but they also haven't even put the stock in the warehouse.

I have called and messaged but have been constantly fobbed off and lied to with 'it's moving through the warehouse'. The truth is they are focusing on their bigger customers because they pay them more money.

We've been flooded with complaints and are busy issuing refunds when we should be focusing on sales.

Nobody cares, nobody listens. So I have no option but to voice my concerns here instead.

If you're looking for a service you can depend upon when your business needs it the most, Shipmonk, unfortunately, isn't the answer.

title: The most stressful fulfillment company
reviews:
The most stressful fulfillment company. Stay away from ShipMonk or ShitMonk.
It took them 7 days to ship Black Friday's order out! They are useless and make you pay premium service.
What a waste of time and business.

title: Need A Platform That Effectively Fulfills and Delivers Your Products
reviews: If your looking for a fulfillment center that can store and ship your products on time, every time, ShipMonk’s the way to go.

title: Shipmonk is THE WORST part of running a business
reviews:
We've been using Shipmonk for a year and half now and it has honestly been the most painful part of running a business. We thought that outsourcing fulfillment to them would make our e-commerce & wholesale business easier to run, but it has been nothing short of a nightmare at every turn. Shipmonk has good software systems, but really really bad processes, and the worst customer service (worse than calling your cable or phone company).

Some examples: They lose inventory upon receiving, because they don't check what they sign for when product is delivered to them vs. what they actually receive and enter into the system. So when shipments show as delivered but the inventory is missing from the warehouse, their excuse is that they receive too many shipments to possibly try to check what was actually received. They have literally, on multiple occasions, lost thousands of dollars of inventory, and even when escalated to the CEO, refuse to accept ownership of this or do anything about it. And because they signed the delivery slip, you can no longer claim for a lost package from the shipper.

They have extremely poor customer service - they literally do not care or do anything to fix it when they make mistakes, they make the same mistakes again and again, and have no escalation path. There is literally no one even at the highest levels that will address their process issues or the huge costly mistakes they constantly make. You can email the CEO and he couldn't care less.

They are ok with direct to consumer but absolutely horrible with wholesale. It takes 1 week+ to provide shipping quotes for wholesale orders, and you have to check on them constantly to make sure wholesale orders actually go out. They will change the order status to "shipped", and then never provide a tracking number, so you have to remember to go back and review all of your orders to ensure they actually went out. They send international orders using shipping methods that get sent back by customs, they package products in a way where they get damaged easily, and are bad with any kind of non-standard ask.

While some businesses are very customer service oriented, Shipmonk is at the opposite spectrum. Calling their agents "happiness engineers" is a literal farce.

If you think running a business is hard, try running one using Shipmonk. If I can give advice to anyone looking for a fulfillment center, it would be to avoid Shipmonk, and ask other services really detailed questions about how they handle issues.

I would give Shipmonk negative stars if I could, and ask for the weeks of my life back, that were spent agonizing over all the problems they've caused that have been ludicrous or impossible to fix.

In the end you just throw your hands up and say, well I guess they've lost a few thousand dollars of inventory again and won't do anything about it, and just move on for the sake of your own sanity, rather than engaging in another pointless conversation with an enragingly unhelpful agent or executive at Shipmonk.

title: Shipmonk understands customer needs
reviews: Had struggles with many fulfilment partners before. Mistakes happen in fulfilment, but fast and proper communication is key. Shipmonk has proven to be a great partner for us.

title: Really BAD company
reviews:
Really BAD company. I would recommend to stay away from.

I have been running eCommerce businesses for 15 years, and ShipMonk has been, unfortunately, my worst customer experience with any vendor ever.

Every single part of the cycle has been horrendus, horrible, tiring and filled with mistakes from ShipMonk's end.

From shipping the products, doing special projects, to receiving wrong prices upfront and explanations on how their pricing working, from doing errors of shipping and errors of constuction. Bad. Bad. Bad.

And as with every bad company, LEAVING and STOPPING the relationship has been a very long, tedius and PAINFUL experience. In the end, after I cleared off my billing on the website from our bank, ShipMonk has lied to us, and they still kept that bank connection to us (illegally) and charged us more money than needed and not willing to refund us.

A bad company is bad in the beginning - and also in the end, apparently.

title: Stressful and expensive (What 3PL shouldn't be!)
reviews:
Very rocky start trying to use ShipMonk to fulfill Amazon orders. Very stressful and our seller account was hammered with bad stats for a week on and off.

Got through it and was smooth sailing (so we thought) until the freight charges started getting "adjusted" by the shipping companies. Turns out what ShipMonk call 0.9 lb is actually 1.05 lb so our freight rates effectively doubled which destroyed our margins.

We soldiered on but eventually grew tired of all the nickel and diming with 4% surcharges on all account payment methods except ACH payments, ridiculous "packaging material" charges (for standard size cartons and void fill) which should be part of the Pick n Pack fee and high storage fees due to the way they spread your stock out.

They also lost half a pallet of stock for a week or so (had to close Amazon listing and ShipMonk blamed their warehouse workers for it - great training there guys!) and we've had a number of damaged or lost shipments were the verdict was "the carrier won't pay for that so don't bother claiming".

TL;DR: While I hear ShipBob is just as bad there must be better options elsewhere. Not recommended, stay away unless you enjoy unnecessary stress and expense.

title: Great 3PL service
reviews: Incredible experience working with Shipmonk. I have worked with a few 3PLs for my business and this has been the smoothest operation I have encountered. They receive product well, notify when in stock, the dashboard is very communicative and connects well with my store. Overall, I would recommend them to all of my fellow eComm businesses.

title: Awesome experience
reviews: Awesome experience working with Shipmonk! The service is amazing! I was able to focus on sales and engagement rather than spending hours fulfilling orders!

title: We have been working with ShipMonk for…
reviews: We have been working with ShipMonk for over a year and overall they have done a decent job in handling our merchandise. In the beginning we had some hiccups and then things improved as we moved along. They have been quick to create solutions for problems that we have encountered. We use their service mostly to fulfill our wholesale B2B order to major retail companies such as CVS, Walmart, and Target. We continuously send them containers directly from our factory. Outsourcing the work has helped us focus on what matters the most and that is selling.

title: I Love ShipMonk! Giving it a 5-Star!
reviews:
I am giving ShipMonk a 5-Star review for various reasons! "SIMPLICITY" would be one word to describe the overall user experience and business experience with ShipMonk. They have made a phenomenal job at Simplifying the entire process from Shopify integration to receiving your products in their warehouses and shipping them globally. They have a truly dedicated and devoted Customer Service team to help you every step of the way. Their international shipping rates are attractive and that has been much appreciated by our customers. Working with ShipMonk has been a plain-sailing journey. ShipMonk has made it possible for me to run my business remotely from anywhere in the world which I am truly appreciative and grateful for.

Cheers,
Toulaish, CEO, SleepBliss

title: Wonderful
reviews: It was easy to setup, great customer service! We used Shipmonk Integration with Shopify has been seamless. I definitely recommend

title: Couldn't agree more with some of the…
reviews:
Couldn't agree more with some of the bad reviews. Poor communication, bad service, rates are not what they sales people tell you.
- Called us 4 days after receiving some of our inventory to tell us they couldn't figure out what a "few" of the items are. This was at 4pm on the day our subscription batch should be sent out. They had not inventoried any of the received product, nothing had been done and they didn't attempt to reach out to us. This delay the shipping almost 7 days
- The shipping prices where over 2x what we where quoted not including the pick and pack. Nothing to do with size or weight. We could have shipped for much less doing it ourselves and have many times
- Lots of other issues. Conservatively lost 20% (could be up to 30%) of our customers due to shipping issues while we used them.
Had to spend a ton of money to relocate all of our product. Nightmare
Avoid, Avoid, Avoid.

title: I've had a terrible experience with…
reviews: I've had a terrible experience with this company. When I first contacted their customer service, they assured me that their system would integrate with ClickFunnels and asked me to send my products to their warehouse. After they receive the products, they said it would NOT integrate, and start charging me U$ 250+ a month and would not return my inventory. Until this date, they never returned my products. Be aware of this company.

title: Shipmonk is SCAM - BEWARE
reviews: Shipmonk is SCAM - they have stolen several high value watches that were into their inventory and never issued any refund. Besides of that after 6 month of non-using their service because of this problem they have made an UNAUTHORIZED charge to my credit card for $2.000 usd and not issued any credit - had to call to my bank to make a chargeback. They are scammers!

title: Easy setup, great customer service!
reviews: Easy setup, great customer service! We used Shipmonk for our crowdfund fulfillment and are now using them for our retail and wholesale orders. Integration with Shopify has been seamless. You can tell they are investing in adding more tools as well. Would definitely recommend.

title: Great experience working with Shipmonk…
reviews: Great experience working with Shipmonk with our Amazon business. Very easy to use interface and integration setup to handle fulfillment automatically. Helpful support. Would definitely recommend

title: Really great customer service
reviews: Went to ShipMonk from a recommendation of a good friend. I think the prices are quite reasonable and every person I've talked to there has always been really nice and willing to help.

title: Ship monk helped us grow our company…
reviews: Ship monk helped us grow our company and was there when we needed them

title: Change your name to SHITmonk
reviews:
I had the worst experience fulfilling my small business orders with shipmonk. Internally, we started calling them shitmonk because they were absolutely useless. Not only were we being charged obscenely for storage and shipping rates, but dropping off and picking up our product was an absolute disaster. Products were shipped out incorrectly to customers, boxes were damaged, product was ruined beyond repair. I even talked with Jan, the CEO, only to receive no help or support.

When we tried to pull the plug on working with them, they tied up our inventory for a full month, saying we couldn't come pick it up because they needed to pull it all together. I don't understand how it takes 30 days to put 500 small boxes on 3 pallets. Also getting the BOL to our driver was hell. The stress of working with this company started giving me panic attacks, which is the LAST THING I need as a startup founder.

When we'd go to pick up or drop off, we had to load and unload all of our pallets OURSELVES, which is actually illegal and violates their "safety requirements." The staff refused to help us, and instead sat around a table munching on chips, watching us struggle with the pallet jack.

DO NOT WORK WITH THIS COMPANY! THIS WAS THE BIGGEST WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME SUCK OF MY LIFE. If I didn't work with shitmonk, I'd have $7,000 more in the bank and wouldn't be on Zoloft.

title: I've talked to many 3PL's across the…
reviews: I've talked to many 3PL's across the country and ShipMonk is one of the best i've seen! Their technology platform is top-notch; I especially love the fact that there is an embedded shipping calculator, so you can play with so many scenarios and get pricing. Oh, and their shipping rates are heavily discounted which opens the door for global sales. Highly recommend ShipMonk for all of your storage and fulfillment needs.

title: Shipmonk is an incredible experience
reviews:
Shipmonk is an incredible experience! Very "now"....a bright, vibrant, young fulfillment center, not some dingy old Warehouse. Very simple to integrate with online.
Very helpful with every step of the business from beginning to end.

title: Shipmonk has been an incredible service…
reviews: Shipmonk has been an incredible service for our business. Not having to manage shipping has been a really important part to our company's expansion and we couldn't have done it without the team at Shipmonk. Their customer service is extremely attentive and all of our customers have been happy with the arrival of their packages. I am very grateful for the team at Shipmonk and their support in the growth of our business.

title: Shipmonk is a great order fulfillment…
reviews:
Shipmonk is a great order fulfillment center for eCommerce. Quick Customer service and great online application/platform. We have integrated ours with Shopify store. Two locations in CA and FL can help you optimize shipping costs.

We can highly recommend it!

title: Cool company...
reviews: Cool company, great dash board, fast and efficient. Shipmonk takes the stress out of the fuklfilment process.

title: Shipmonk provides a reliable service
reviews: Shipmonk provides a reliable service and took a big burden off our shoulders. With them taking over fulfillment it freed us up to focus on running the company. Their platform is very user friendly, their shipments timely, and the staff is kind and helpful.

title: Wonderful experience working with…
reviews: Wonderful experience working with Shipmonk! Great for startups of all sizes. :)

title: Great customer support and ease of use.
Absolutely AWFUL company
reviews:
Absolutely AWFUL company. At all costs avoid using them for your business! This company has potentially costs us tens of thousands of dollars! We used them for our subscription box and they fell flat on every promise that they made us, delaying our shipments weeks at a time! And they never communicated with us ANYTHING! This picture shows how I have had to hound them down for a response.

With a MONTHLY subscription box, I can't have uncommunicated WEEKS of delay. I've dealt with SO MANY CHARGEBACKS that my bank had to discontinue service with us.

WORST BUSINESS DECISION EVER DECIDING TO WORK WITH THEM, AVOID THEM LIKE THE PLAGUE

title: Good experience with their fulfillment team...
reviews: We hired Shipmonk to fulfill orders for our startup business on multiple platforms. We were assigned a designated Happiness Engineer (HE) who walked us through an onboarding session to get our team familiarized with the system. Our fulfillment and shipping required custom packing specifications depending on the platform/store orders were processed from and the team was able to work with us on this. When our HE was not available, it was easy to reach out to Shipmonk for assistance by submitting a ticket online in which we would receive a response within 24 hours. The only drawback that we experience is the communication between pacific and eastern time. Although our company is based in California, we preferred the Florida warehouse to complete our order fulfillment. Overall, we are satisfied with Shipmonk’s services and team of professionals.

title: Shipmonk
reviews: If you need a fulfillment company, Shipmonk will handle it.

title: Honestly the best e-commerce…
reviews: Honestly the best e-commerce warehousing and fulfillment service out there. What makes them really stand out is their excellent customer service. Great delivery time and shipping rates, as well as a variety of options to choose from. Overall, highly satisfied with ShipMonk!

title: Affordable but high-quality fulfillment service.
reviews:
We've been using Shipmonk (and their associated Shopify app) for more than a year now.

The onboarding process is fairly easy and they help you connect your store to their fulfillment center, and map the SKUs to their internal inventory codes. You can also do it yourself manually if you create product bundles, for instance, or they will do it for you if you have a lot of them, just by sending them a CSV.

From that moment on, Shipmonk automatically captures the orders from Shopify, processes them, and then inserts the tracking number once the order has been fulfilled.

So all in all, it is a very straightforward process and the only work you need to do is check their interface daily to verify no orders are "stuck" because the buyer entered an incorret address, or you have run out of stock of any item (which you shouldn't, as they provide a forecast on how many days of inventory you have left at the current sales rate.

All in all, very satisfied with their service and the timely delivery of the orders to my customers.

title: THE WORST
reviews: THE WORST. They prepped inventory and sent to amazon. 4 out of 6 were tarnished... we got terrible reviews on our own trustpilot so we're paying it forward.

title: Shipmonk is awesome
reviews: Shipmonk is awesome. I've used multiple 3PL's in the past and they all sucked, Shipmonk is the first one I havent had any issues with!

title: Was supposed to take stress off of my shoulders...
reviews:
We do shop updates and during these updates we receive about 1300-2000 orders in a 24-48 hour period. This was way to much work for just me & my husband to handle, yet we handled it.

Here I am a full week after the shop update and not a single f-@%%@ order has ACTUALLY shipped! All orders are simply marked as pre transit.

Even worse the tracking #s being kicked back into the etsy system are registering as invalid if customers try to track orders externally.

But on top of all of this they have not PICKED OR PACKED a single order in almost THREE BUSINESS DAYS and now I have about 100 orders that are marked late by DAYS to ship or are about to be!

Also I am having to refund people right & left as they say I am backordered on items even though we meticulously counted our stock with a clicker. Even on items we only sent 16 of they say we miscounted and only had 13... I'm pretty sure I know the difference between 13 and 16.

The first batch of inventory they right off the bat lost an entire bag saying we had miscounted and only sent 1 bag of a SKU that I had TAPED together.

So here I am with hundreds and hundreds of loyal customers who are pretty upset especially because I had to raise my shipping rates to use this service.

Then to add insult to injury they aren't even shipping chronologically! So add this to the backorder issue and we are having to refund people who bought things in the very first moments of the sale while folks who placed orders days later get the item!

By now be and my husband would have had at least 1000 orders fully shipped out, sure we'd be exhausted physically and emotionally from it but at this point it may have been less stressful than not being able to do anything to help our customers.

Also this was our holiday sale so we now have to shut down our shop early as we are worried any further orders will simply not be processed or shipped in time to arrive. So I will also be loosing potential sales.

You better believe this is also going to lead to some less than five star reviews for my shop too!

title: Shipmonk is the worst 3PL we have ever…
reviews: Shipmonk is the worst 3PL we have ever worked with - and that is not an understatement. They have consistently misshipped to our customers (literally sending products from their other clients to our customer), created excessive delays in shipping, and overbilled us for all of the above. In the process they were negligent in communication and would also never take ownership of the problem and find a solution. The disaster continues.

title: Awesome service
reviews: Awesome service! Never experienced such a great customer service experience. Highly recommended!

title: We always had a good experiencia with shipmonk service
reviews: We always had a good experiencia with shipmonk, all the services they have offered have been executed with excellence, consumer service is very good, and about the rates they always offered several options which is very good.

title: fulfillment done right
reviews:
Shipmonk took an idea and made it a reality for us. Pastor Box ships quarterly and I’ve heard nothing but accolades from my subscribers. Sure the content will make or break a subscription box, but if the fulfillment process is not executed with care and attention to detail, it would never succeed. My CRM not only “held our hand” as we were getting started (all new territory for us), she’s stuck with us every step of the way. I’m thrilled with Shipmonk.
- Dave Wike, Founder, Pastor Box

title: I am a small business owner and…
reviews:
I am a small business owner and preferred to spend time growing my business , so I decided to try Shipmonk as my fulfillment company . I dont have any regrets , their staff is so quick to follow , they are very professional . Their system is very easy to use as well.
Love them

title: Excellent
reviews: I used them as a shipping partner for our e-com store. Excellent experience. Very helpful and friendly staff. Go ahead if you are on the fence. You won't be disappointed.

title: Very pleasant to work with
reviews: Very pleasant to work with. While not perfect, because nobody is, they are always willing and ready to work with me towards a solution. Any company with such an attitude deserves a full 5 stars in my book and I would highly recommend them.

title: Kudos to Bridgette.
reviews: I appreciate Bridgette so much. She's so helpful today for doing an extra mile for me. Hey give her a Venti coffee to warm her up! -Sab

title: I've been using them for over a year…
reviews: I've been using them for over a year now and everything is going without problems. Perfect platform without any breaks from the tech side and with fastest shipping i've seen!

title: Super service- and client-oriented…
reviews:
Super service- and client-oriented logistician and logistic system!

The shipmonk software is super easy and intuitive to use. You have a great overview of all key facts and your storage. Additionally the support is extremely flexible, super fast and very friendly yet knowledgeable. Highly recommended!

title: "Can-do" customer support
reviews: "Can-do" customer support. They call their customer support agents, "Happiness Engineers" and these guys know their software, are on-site and are extremely reachable. Most gratifying is that ShipMonk gives these Happiness Engineers the green light to go ahead and solve problems on their own, without the usual run-it-up-the-chain-of-command-of-the-bureaucracy that I've encountered with other logistics companies. Very responsive, very courteous, very can-do!

title: Great Order Fulfillment Service…
reviews: The tools and dashboard are very simple and easy to use and make handling your shipping, orders, and inventory very easy and transparent. If you need someone to handle your order fulfillment shipmonk is great for this.

title: Great team and great support!
reviews: It is easy to use. It provides the data in the simplest yet unique manner. To be honest, there was not a single issue that I possibly could identify. The staff is very friendly Aidan and Michaela are very nice and gentle people.

title: Shipmonk has been an ideal fulfillment service
reviews: Shipmonk has been an ideal fulfillment solution for the ecommerce side of our business. Their service is responsive, their shipping rates are very reasonable, and the process couldn't be easier. Very happy we switched to their service rather than continuing to fulfill ourselves.

title: Shipmonk is fantastic
reviews: Shipmonk is fantastic! The staff is great, they are always there to help and sort out things that are quite complicated to me (shipping stuff). They have a unique expertise and I can always count on them!

title: We love Shipmonk
reviews: We love Shipmonk! Great support and helps our business tremendously.

title: We integrated ShipMonk with our …
reviews:
We integrated ShipMonk with our e-commerce store around a year ago, and have only positive experience. ShipMonk is a very professional operation with excellent customer support (in case you need it). The integration automatically send orders arriving on our shopping platform to the ShipMonk inventory platform, the only interaction required from us is to decide on the shipping method, when that's done the order ships. We decide on shipping method depending on destination. By teaming up with ShipMonk you have a fully integrated shopping cart / logistics setup which works very, very well.

Thor
tht global
